00036 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( FileInputTest );
00037 
00038 static bool CompareFloats(float f1, float f2)
00039 {
00040         const float EPS = 0.0000001f;
00041         return (fabs(f1-f2) < EPS);
00042 }
00043 
00044 #define TEST_DATA_FILE "../data/test.file"

00047 {
00048 }
00049 
00050 void FileInputTest::tearDown()

00052 }
00053 
00054 void FileInputTest::testdefine_SIZES()
00055 {
00056         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( sizeof(int8_t) == 1 );
00057         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( sizeof(int16_t) == 2 );
00058         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( sizeof(int32_t) == 4 );
00059         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( sizeof(int64_t) == 8 );
00060         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( sizeof(u_int8_t) == 1 );
00061         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( sizeof(u_int16_t) == 2 );
00062         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( sizeof(u_int32_t) == 4 );
00063         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( sizeof(u_int64_t) == 8 );
00064 }
00065 
00066 void FileInputTest::testmethod_ReadInt8()
00067 {
00068         ifstream instr;
00069         string file = TEST_DATA_FILE + string(".char");
00070         instr.open(file.c_str(), ios::in | ios::binary);
00071         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( instr );
00072         int8_t val=0;
00073         val = FileInput::ReadInt8(instr);
00074         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(val == 11 );
00075         val = FileInput::ReadInt8(instr);
00076         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(val == 22 );
00077         val = FileInput::ReadInt8(instr);
00078         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(val == 33 );
00079         instr.close();
00080 }
00081 
00082 void FileInputTest::testmethod_ReadInt16()
00083 {
00084         ifstream instr;
00085         string file = TEST_DATA_FILE + string(".short");
00086         instr.open(file.c_str(), ios::in | ios::binary);
00087         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( instr );
00088         int16_t val=0;
00089         val = FileInput::ReadInt16(instr);
00090         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(val == -21 );
00091         val = FileInput::ReadInt16(instr);
00092         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(val == 21 );
00093         val = FileInput::ReadInt16(instr);
00094         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(val == -31 );
00095         instr.close();
00096 }

00162 void FileInputTest::testmethod_ReadInt8_stream()
00163 {
00164         ifstream instr;
00165         string file = TEST_DATA_FILE + string(".char");
00166         instr.open(file.c_str(), ios::in | ios::binary);
00167         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( instr );
00168         int8_t strm[3];
00169         int8_t val=0;
00170         instr.read((char *)strm, sizeof(strm[0])*3);
00171         char *p = (char *)strm;
00172         val = FileInput::ReadInt8(p);
00173         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(val == 11 );
00174         val = FileInput::ReadInt8(p);
00175         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(val == 22 );
00176         val = FileInput::ReadInt8(p);
00177         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(val == 33 );
00178         instr.close();
00179 }

00276 void FileInputTest::testmethod_ReadFloat()
00277 {
00278         ifstream instr;
00279         string file = TEST_DATA_FILE + string(".float");
00280         instr.open(file.c_str(), ios::in | ios::binary);
00281         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( instr );
00282         float val=0.0f;
00283         val = FileInput::ReadFloat(instr);
00284         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( CompareFloats(val, 321.123f) );
00285         val = FileInput::ReadFloat(instr);
00286         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( CompareFloats(val, 123.123f) );
00287         val = FileInput::ReadFloat(instr);
00288         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( CompareFloats(val, 543.56f) );
00289         instr.close();
00290 }
00291

00293 {

00299         float val=0.0f;
00300         instr.read((char *)strm, sizeof(strm[0])*3);
00301         char *p = (char *)strm;
00302         val = FileInput::ReadFloat(p);
00303         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( CompareFloats(val, 321.123f) );
00304         val = FileInput::ReadFloat(p);
00305         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( CompareFloats(val, 123.123f) );
00306         val = FileInput::ReadFloat(p);
00307         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( CompareFloats(val, 543.56f) );
00308         instr.close();
00309 }

00311 void FileInputTest::testmethod_ReadString8()
00312 {
00313         ifstream instr;
00314         string file = TEST_DATA_FILE + string(".string8");
00315         instr.open(file.c_str(), ios::in | ios::binary);
00316         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( instr );
00317         string val;
00318         val = FileInput::ReadString8(instr);
00319         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( val == string("string") );
00320         val = FileInput::ReadString8(instr);
00321         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( val == string("test") );
00322         val = FileInput::ReadString8(instr);
00323         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( val == string("case") );
00324         instr.close();
00325 }
00326 
00327 void FileInputTest::testmethod_ReadString8_stream()
00328 {
00329         ifstream instr;
00330         string file = TEST_DATA_FILE + string(".string8");
00331         instr.open(file.c_str(), ios::in | ios::binary);
00332         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( instr );
00333         instr.seekg(0, ios::end);
00334         int flen = instr.tellg();
00335         instr.seekg(0, ios::beg);
00336         char *strm = new char[flen+1];
00337         char *s = strm;
00338         instr.read(strm, flen);
00339         string sval;
00340         sval = FileInput::ReadString8(s);
00341         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( sval == string("string") );
00342         sval = FileInput::ReadString8(s);
00343         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( sval == string("test") );
00344         sval = FileInput::ReadString8(s);
00345         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( sval == string("case") );
00346         instr.close();
00347         delete[] strm;
00348 }
00349 
00350 void FileInputTest::testmethod_ReadString8_fixedlen()
00351 {
00352         ifstream instr;
00353         string file = TEST_DATA_FILE + string(".string8");
00354         instr.open(file.c_str(), ios::in | ios::binary);
00355         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( instr );
00356         string val;
00357         int32_t ival;
00358         ival = FileInput::ReadInt32(instr);
00359         val = FileInput::ReadString8(instr, ival);
00360         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( val == string("string") );
00361         ival = FileInput::ReadInt32(instr);
00362         val = FileInput::ReadString8(instr, ival);
00363         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( val == string("test") );
00364         ival = FileInput::ReadInt32(instr);
00365         val = FileInput::ReadString8(instr, ival);
00366         CPPUNIT_ASSERT( val == string("case") );
00367         instr.close();
00368 }
